title: Expectation values of descendent fields in the sine-Gordon model
abstract: We obtain exactly the vacuum expectation values $<(\partial\phi)^2 ({\bar\partial}\phi) e^{i\alpha\phi}>$ in the sine-Gordon model and $$ in $\Phi_{1,3}$ perturbed minimal CFT. We discuss applications of these results to short-distance expansions of two-point correlation functions.
